Title: Finding Sarkareth
Description: Now that we have a foothold within the garrison, we can extend our search. We will hold off the forces of Aberrus here while you find Emberthal and aid her in reaching Sarkareth. We will join you as soon as we secure the front here.
ObjectivesText: Meet Emberthal within the Aberrus Approach.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Emberthal within the Aberrus Approach.
